default.name: Professional
default.description: Uses a formal tone focusing on accuracy and clarity of communication. Ideal for business documents, official reports, or academic articles.
default.prompt: Adopt a formal, precise tone. Focus on providing clear, well-structured content with accurate data. Ensure that the language adheres to professional and academic standards.

default.name: Casual
default.description: Characterized by a relaxed, informal tone, often using colloquial expressions or slang. Perfect for blogs, social media, or casual correspondence.
default.prompt: Utilize an informal, friendly tone. Incorporate colloquial language and personal anesaidotes to create a relatable and engaging narrative.

default.name: Persuasive
default.description: Focuses on convincing the reader of a particular point of view or action, using rhetorical techniques such as emotion, logic, or authority.
default.prompt: Employ persuasive techniques including appealing to emotions, using logical arguments, and referencing authoritative sources to convincingly present your case.

default.name: Informative
default.description: Aims to deliver specific information or data without adding personal opinion or emotion. Useful for creating instructions, guides, or product descriptions.
default.prompt: Maintain a neutral tone and focus strictly on providing accurate and useful information. Avoid personal opinions or emotional language.

default.name: Narrative
default.description: Tells a story, often from a first-person perspective, engaging the reader in the plot. Ideal for fiction, short stories, or scripts.
default.prompt: Adopt a storytelling approach with a clear narrative arc. Use vivid descriptions and develop characters to engage readers emotionally and intellectually.

default.name: Analytical
default.description: Thoroughly analyzes topics or issues, compares data, and explores cases. Effective in reviews, scientific research, or market analysis.
default.prompt: Analyze information critically. Compare and contrast different viewpoints or data points. Ensure your analysis is thorough and well-reasoned.

default.name: Inspirational
default.description: Aims to motivate and inspire the reader with a positive message. Great for motivational speeches, personal development articles, or leadership pieces.
default.prompt: Craft content that uplifts and motivates. Use inspiring stories and a positive tone to encourage and empower your audience.

default.name: Educational
default.description: Focuses on teaching the reader, explaining complex concepts in an understandable way. Effective in educational materials, online courses, or tutorials.
default.prompt: Explain concepts clearly and in an easy-to-understand manner. Use examples and step-by-step instructions to aid in learning.

default.name: Specialized
default.description: Uses technical language and focuses on details specific to a particular field. Useful in industry-specific publications, specialized scientific texts, or technical documentation.
default.prompt: Use technical terms and detailed explanations appropriate for an expert audience. Focus on accuracy and depth of information.

default.name: Empathetic
default.description: Identifies with the reader's emotions, trying to understand their perspective and reflecting their feelings. Can be used in psychology, therapy, or mental health articles.
default.prompt: Show deep empathy and understanding. Reflect the readerâ€™s feelings and provide thoughtful insights into their experiences.

default.name: Satirical
default.description: Uses humor, irony, and exaggeration to critique or mock particular behaviors, trends, or societal attitudes. Perfect for satirical columns, comedies, or film scripts.
default.prompt: Incorporate irony, satire, and exaggeration to critique or highlight absurdities in current trends or behaviors.

default.name: Conciliatory
default.description: Aims to mitigate tensions, find common ground, and promote understanding between different parties. Can be used in mediation, conflict resolution articles, or negotiation scenarios.
default.prompt: Adopt a tone focused on reconciling differences. Aim to understand various viewpoints and find a middle ground that respects all perspectives.
